name: Oogvereniging Nederland
goal: De Oogvereniging is de patiënten- en belangenorganisatie voor iedereen in Nederland die iets aan zijn ogen heeft.
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
euInitiatives:
- European Accessibility Act
- Web Accessibility Directive
- United Nations Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities
- European Disability Strategy
